titles.title: To the Ends of the Earth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Love unfailing, overtaking my heart. You take me in.
Finding peace again, fear is lost in all You are.

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
And I would give the world to tell Your story
'Cause I know that You've called me,
I know that You've called me.
I've lost myself for good within Your promise,
And I won't hide it, I won't hide it.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus, I believe in You and I would go
To the ends of the earth, to the ends of the earth.
For You alone are the Son of God
And all the world will see
That You are God, You are God
